posts.title: Hexo教程
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 1、创建一篇新的文章1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing 2、生成静态文件1$ hexo generate 或者 $ hexo g More info: Generating 3、启动服务1$ hexo server 或者 $ hexo s More info: Server 4、发布到远程站点1$ hexo deploy 或者 $ hexo d More info: Deployment
